targets.expr: node_filesystem_size_bytes{job="$job", instance=~"$instance", device=~"/.*"} - node_filesystem_avail_bytes{job="$job", instance=~"$instance", device=~"/.*"}
avg by (device, mountpoint) (1 - (node_filesystem_avail_bytes{job="$job", instance=~"$instance", device=~"/.*"} / node_filesystem_size_bytes{job="$job", instance=~"$instance", device=~"/.*"}))
avg by (mountpoint) (node_filesystem_size_bytes{job="$job", instance=~"$instance", device=~"/.*"} - node_filesystem_avail_bytes{job="$job", instance=~"$instance", device=~"/.*"})
avg by (mountpoint) (1 - (node_filesystem_avail_bytes{job="$job", instance=~"$instance", device=~"/.*"} / node_filesystem_size_bytes{job="$job", instance=~"$instance", device=~"/.*"}))
